!Supervisor of the treasures: You selected the correct part of the memoirs, which is stored in this room. Now I will pose to you [egkiy] question in order to verify, you are worthy to take away this book. If you know the content of these memoirs, then you will answer with the ease it. But you be attentive, if you are mistaken, then you will not be able to take away the book and to leave hence. [Quest _10294_SevenSignsMonasteryofSilence take_test|To say that they are ready to testing]
